TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OrderedEnumerableRowCollection`1<TRow> extends System.Data.EnumerableRowCollection`1<!TRow>

Docs.typeparam: The type of objects in the source sequence, typically .
Docs.summary: This API supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. Represents a collection of ordered objects returned from a query.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Data.OrderedEnumerableRowCollection%601> is used to contain the results of a LINQ to DataSet query that returns an ordered sequence of rows. This <xref:System.Data.EnumerableRowCollection%601> maintains a state of call LINQ operators for the originating query, and this state is used to construct the predicate and sorting expressions for any subsequent <xref:System.Data.DataView>.
An <xref:System.Data.OrderedEnumerableRowCollection%601> cannot be directly instantiated because there are no public constructors for this class.
